select m.name as gradingName, su.nick_name as userName, c.content as title, gcd.id as contentId, gcd.score from grading_content_detail gcd join sys_user su on su.user_id = gcd.grading_user_id join grading_content gc on gc.id = gcd.content_id join grading_content_rel gcr on gcr.content_id = gc.id join grading g on g.id = gcr.grading_id = g.id join grading_content c on gc.row_id = c.row_id join grading_template_meta gtm on gtm.id = c.template_meta_id and sort = 0 join grading_template_meta m on gc.template_meta_id = m.id where g.id = #{gradingId} and gc.system_value = 0
and gcd.grading_user_id = #{userId} order by gc.row_id asc
